What it is:A unique, water-break gel-cream formula featuring Japanese marine algae and hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture and keep skin looking dewy, supple, and plump all day.

Solutions for:

- Dullness and uneven texture

- Loss of firmness and elasticity

- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…A new, marine-enriched Moisture Cushion is now infused with a unique Japanese marine algae harvested from the waters of Okinawa. Commonly referred to as “sea grapes” or “green caviar”, this Japanese algae is fortified with essential amino acids and B vitamins, working synergistically with hyaluronic acid to enhance skin’s elasticity and moisture content. As you massage the formula into skin, feel the texture break into a fresh water-like gel. Get balanced, lightweight hydration to visibly smooth fine lines and experience a dewy, healthy-looking complexion without looking greasy.
What else you need to know:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, fragrance-free, and hypoallergenic.

- 96% agreed this moisturizer did not clog their pores
- 83% felt this moisturizer soothed and calmed their skin
- 81% agreed their skin looked and felt hydrated and refreshed
- 79% agreed their face looked smoother and felt softer

What it is:
 A two-step face treatment that drives essential actives into the skin through a reviving oxygen exchange for an instantly dewy, healthy-looking complexion.
Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Uneven skin tone
If you want to know more…
 Developed to deeply hydrate, cool, and visibly plump the skin, the Hyaluronic Marine Hydrating Modeling Mask is a professional-grade product straight from Dr. Gross' New York City practice. The two-step gel and loose powder formula improves the appearance of fine lines and pores, revives dull, dry, and dehydrated skin, and smooths the appearance of uneven skin tone and texture for skin that looks firm, supple, and dewy. The system is designed to create an occlusive barrier, loaded with humectants to seal in hydration, while an algae and calcium complex draws heat to cool and calm the skin. Medical grade marine algae, harvested from arctic Norwegian seas, and deeply hydrating hyaluronic acid work to instantly create the appearance of plumper skin and seal in moisture for lasting hydration.
This set contains:
- 1.58 oz/ 46.7 mL Step 1 Hyaluronic Cushion Gel
- 0.12 oz/ 3.5 mL Step 2 Activating PowderWhat else you need to know:
 This product is cruelty-free and formulated without oil. Use this treatment post-workout or pre-party to visibly reduce redness and prime skin for easy makeup application, or before a flight to prevent dehydrated skin and after landing for visibly plumper skin.

- 87% of participants agreed their skin looked and felt more plump

Product: Collagen POP + Vitamin C Dissolvable Tablets
About:
Beauty Benefit: Visibly Increased Firmness & Elasticity, Glowing Skin, and Stronger Hair & Nails

What it is: A dissolvable tablet that transforms your water into a wild-strawberry-and-lemon beauty tonic to visibly improve your skin from the inside out.

What it Tastes Like: Natural wild strawberry and lemon

When to Expect Results: Four to six weeks

What Else You Need to Know: With its wild-strawberry-and-lemon flavor, this unique, fizzy formula makes staying hydrated fun while visibly supporting your skin’s beauty and health*.

Collagen, a blend of amino acids found throughout the body, is a major component of connective tissues such as cartilage, tendons, ligaments, bones, and skin. The body produces this protein every day, but as we age, collagen production slows down and the skin enzyme collagenase breaks it down more quickly than the body can make it. This leads to fine lines, wrinkles, less-firm skin, and weakened joints. It may be helpful to add collagen to the diet to visibly slow the aging process and rejuvenate the skin. Due to their similarity in structure to human collagen and high bioavailability and absorption, fish-derived collagen and collagen peptides are considered excellent skin nutrients. They have the potential to visibly improve dermal rejuvenation, hydration, and firmness and to possibly support skin-collagen metabolism.

Clinical Results: In a study of individuals taking marine collagen for 4 to 8 weeks:
- 68% reported an improvement in the overall appearance of their skin, including improvements in fine lines, wrinkles, hyperpigmentation, texture, tone, and smoothness

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
ingredients:

Product: Collagen Love™ Skin Firming Supplement with Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C
About:
Beauty Benefit: Visibly Increased Firmness and Elasticity, Glowing Skin, and Stronger Hair & Nails

What it is: A supplement formulated with collagen types I and III (grass-fed-bovine sourced), hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C to visibly strengthen, smooth, and firm your skin.

What it Tastes Like: No flavor

When to Expect Results: Four to six weeks

What Else You Need to Know: This supplement contains a unique skin-repair and -protection blend with collagen types I and III—essential for healthy-, young-looking skin. The restorative blend also has chondroitin sulfate and moisturizing hyaluronic acid to support visible firmness and elasticity in all the right places*.

Collagen is a blend of amino acids (the smaller building blocks of larger proteins throughout the body) and a component of connective tissues such as cartilage, tendons, ligaments, bones, and skin. Collagen types I and III are the most abundant forms found in the skin and are important for its structure, elasticity, and firmness. As we age, we lose collagen due to slower production of the protein and also due to collagenase, the enzyme in skin that breaks it down. These two factors are natural bodily processes that contribute to aging and the breakdown of healthy tissue, so it can be helpful to add in a high-quality collagen supplement. The addition of hyaluronic acid helps to hydrate the skin by increasing water retention. Vitamin C, red wine extract, and grapeseed extract are powerful antioxidants that scavenge free radicals to reduce oxidative stress (a major contributor to aging). Studies have shown a significant reduction of facial lines, wrinkles, and dryness with an increase in collagen content.

Clinical Results: In a double-blind, placebo-controlled study of women receiving 2.5 or 5.0 g of collagen or placebo once daily for 8 weeks:
- Skin elasticity in both collagen-dosage groups showed a statistically significant improvement in comparison to placebo

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
ingredients:
-Collagen Peptides: Essential for healthy-, young-looking skin.
-Hyaluronic Acid: Helps the skin retain moisture.
-Vitamin C: Visibly minimizes fine lines and wrinkles.

About:
What it is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Signal Peptide Complex (Growth Factors): Nine signal peptides (made up of amino
acids, which form proteins in the skin) bind moisture to skin—visibly plumping, firming,
and restoring bounce.
- Pygmy Waterlily Stem Cell Extract: An excellent source of antioxidants and nutrients to replenish the skin; extremely moisturizing, soothing, and calming; and effective in supporting healthy-, youthful-looking skin.
- Soybean Folic Acid Ferment Extract: This B vitamin plays a central role in maintaining youthful-, elastic-looking skin. Skin is thirsty for folic acid, especially after exposure to sun.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Protini™ restores younger-, revived-looking skin. Lines, wrinkles, and sun damage appear reduced and skin feels strengthened and moisturized. Think of Protini™ like adding protein to your smoothie. Abundant with proteins and nutrients, it replenishes and restores skin to a visibly strong, healthy state. It has a pH of 4.0.
This cream is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
Award Wins:
CEW, 2019 Beauty Awards
Harper‘s BAZAAR, 2019 Anti-Aging Award
Byrdie Beauty, 2019 Skincare Award
Influenster, 2019 Best Indie Facial Moisturizer

- 100% agreed their skin felt replenished and nourished

- Dryness

If you want to know more…
The Water Cream provides nutrient-rich, balanced hydration with the unique water-burst that breaks upon application to deliver nourishment without leaving skin sticky or greasy. It clarifies and refines skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals: Japanese wild rose visibly tightens pores and smooths skin texture; Japanese leopard lily helps control excess oil and purify skin by supporting natural skin turnover; and hadasei-3—an anti-aging trinity of green tea, rice, and algae—restores healthy-looking radiance. The formula imparts a subtle, shine-free glow with a touch of 23-karat gold.
What else you need to know:
Beauty icons for over 300 years, geisha adopted Japanese wild rose to create a refined, poreless-looking canvas underneath their makeup. The Water Cream has harnessed this potent botanical to honor the original makeup lover. This pure formula is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.

About:
What it is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

- Pitera™: Contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and natural acids to condition skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; and until now, SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.
ingredients:

About:
What it is: A three-piece set featuring SK-II’s Pitera™ Facial Treatment Essence plus samples of the Facial Treatment Cleanser and SKINPOWER Airy Milky Lotion.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Pitera: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's natural moisturizing factors; contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and acids that condition skin's natural functions.
- InfinitPower Technology: An exclusive cocktail of power ingredients formulated with calla lily extract, dokudami extract, and peony extract to charge the power source of skin to visibly plump up from within.

What Else You Need to Know: Pitera Essence is a powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin tone, enhance visible radiance, and more. Try it with this three-step introductory kit to cleanse, treat, and moisturize skin.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty Winner.

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

What it is:
A lightweight, oil-free, antiaging treatment that improves visible signs of aging.

What it is formulated to do:
Jack Black’s Line Smoother Oil-Free Moisturizer improves texture and helps even out minor skin discolorations, leaving skin smoother and younger-looking. Natural fruit acids—eight percent glycolic acid, a natural acid found in sugar cane—help minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by sloughing off the top layer of dead skin cells, revealing softer skin hidden beneath the surface. The quick-absorbing formula provides intense yet lightweight moisturization with no lingering greasy feel.

This product is dermatologist tested and free of alcohol, fragrance, and colorants.

About:
What it is: A potent 15 percent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve the signs of photoaging.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Potent Antioxidant Complex (15% L-Ascorbic Acid plus Ferulic Acid and 1% Vitamin E): Firms and brightens the look and feel of skin while minimizing the signs of photoaging from pollution and other environmental stressors.
- Pumpkin Ferment and Pomegranate Extract: These ingredients work together to enzymatically dissolve dead surface skin cells, minimizing the appearance of pores.
- Chronocyclin: A chronopeptide that mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D for more youthful-looking skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: C-Firma™ is designed to be mixed by you before its first use, which maximizes the potency of its ingredients while keeping the formula fresh. An antioxidant complex of l-ascorbic and ferulic acids, and vitamin E, reveal radiance, luminosity and an even-looking complexion as it hydrates and soothes.

C-Firma™ is formulated at a pH of 2.5. No refrigeration required!

It is 100 percent free of essential oils, silicones, colorants, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of Drunk Elephant’s products except their sunscreen Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, keeping it safe.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

And, with hyaluronic acid, this multi-acid serum helps reinforce the skin’s moisture barrier. Plus you’ll love this serum’s minimal, naturally derived orange scent that was rigorously tested for safety, toxicity, and allergens.

About:
What it is: A satiny serum formulated to tackle the major visible signs of aging under and around the eyes such as fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Copper Peptides: Reduce the appearance of wrinkles and promote a more elastic feel to the skin.
- Leontopodium Alpinum (Edelweiss) Meristem Cell Culture: Soothes while powerful antioxidants combat visible signs of aging.
- Black Tea Ferment: Smooths skin roughness, visibly improves radiance, and decreases glycation—a process that has been shown to age the appearance of skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Shaba Complex™ Firming Eye Serum contains potent doses of black tea ferment, niacinamide, copper peptides, and edelweiss stem cells that work together to support a smoother, younger look around the eyes. The result is a rested, more youthful appearance.

This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state..

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Awards:
- Men‘s Health, 2020 15 Best Eye Cream for Men
- Rave Reviews, 2019 Best Eye Creams

About:
What it is: A 0.5% retinol serum enriched with Australian botanicals for progressive resurfacing overnight to target visible uneven tone, texture, fine lines, and wrinkles.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Lightweight Serum

Highlighted Ingredients:
- 0.5% Retinol: Resurfaces the skin to diminish the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven tone.
- Evening Primrose and Jojoba Seed Oil: Antioxidant-rich botanicals that work to restore the skin‘s barrier function and maintain hydration.
- Tomato Fruit Extract: A natural extract that helps to maintain collagen and visible skin firmness.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This is a sheer, nonirritating retinol serum with nourishing antioxidant Australian botanicals (jojoba, macadamia, and sweet almond oil). It is formulated to support skin renewal and diminish the appearance of uneven skin tone and texture as well as soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles while improving visible elasticity for smooth, radiant skin.

Clinical Results: In an 8-week trial with 20 participants:
89% of people saw a smoother, more even skin tone and texture
80% of people said skin felt firmer or lifted
80% of people said fine lines and wrinkles felt/looked less visible

ingredients:
Suggested Usage:
-In the evening, apply three to four drops to a freshly cleansed face, neck, and décolletage.
-Allow to absorb into the skin prior to applying your nighttime moisturizer.
-Introduce slowly, and after skin has adapted to using the serum, application frequency can be increased to every second night.
-Use on alternating nights to Liquid Gold Exfoliating Tonic (sold separately).

Recycling Instructions:
-Alpha-H‘s tubes, bottles, and cardboard packaging are all 100 percent recyclable.
-Fold the box flat.
-Remove the cap from the glass dropper.
-Rinse the glass bottle, making sure all excess product is washed out.
-Recycle the box, the dropper, and the bottle.

Product: Smart Clinical Repair™ Wrinkle Correcting Serum
About:
What it is: A trailblazing, cutting-edge formula—designed with an expert panel of scientists and dermatologists—that’s super concentrated with visibly age-diminishing ingredients like CL1870 Laser Focus Complex™, an expert peptide-rich blend, plus a potent retinoid and hyaluronic acid.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Highlighted Ingredients:
- CL1870 Laser Focus Complex™: Supports natural collagen production for a visibly stronger skin-support structure.
- Potent Retinoid: Supports natural cell renewal to shed dull surface skin and speed fresh cells to the surface for less-visible wrinkles.
- Hyaluronic Acid Concentrate: Rapidly hydrates, visibly restoring suppleness and volume to diminish the appearance of fine, dry lines.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates SLS & SLES, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It also comes in recyclable packaging.

It supports natural collagen production with CL1870 Laser Focus Complex for visibly stronger skin, smooths the look of texture with a potent retinoid for a resurfaced appearance, and hydrates with hyaluronic acid for a re-plumped look with less-visible wrinkles. Skin is left visibly rejuvenated, smooth, and supple to the touch with a look of youthful radiance and bounce restored.

Clinical Results: In consumer testing on 358 women, after 10 days:
- 84% said deeper wrinkles looked reduced
- 94% said skin looked smoother
- 87% said skin felt more plumped

About:
What it is: A cooling, hydrating overnight mask that visibly plumps and restores with an electrolyte cocktail while supporting skin’s acid mantle—plus a nightly serum sample.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Four-Electrolyte Blend: Antioxidant-rich and powerful humectant ingredients (coconut water, sodium PCA, magnesium PCA, and prickly pear extract); electrolytes are vital to helping maintain hydration levels in skin, supporting barrier strength and lipid content, visibly calming redness, and protecting against environmental dehydration.
- Vitamin F: Contains soothing fatty acids (linolenic and linoleic), which play a vital role in maintaining hydration levels, visibly improving skin texture and suppleness, soothing skin, and supporting acid-mantle strength.
- Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Has a wide range of benefits, most notably the ability to visibly improve signs of aging (fine lines, wrinkles, loss of firmness, and uneven tone and texture).

Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Barrier-replenishing ingredients niacinamide, sodium PCA, plant squalane, ceramides, omega fatty acids, and antioxidants rehydrate hung-over, parched skin for a soft, supple feel, visibly improved signs of damage, and even-looking texture and tone. Vitamin F beads deliver extra emollience and soothing hydration.

Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

About:

✔ Normal
✔ Oily

What it is:
An age-reversing serum supercharged with antioxidants, natural SPF, hyaluronic acid, and Australian wildcrafted ingredients.

Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Loss of firmness and elasticity
- Uneven skin tone

If you want to know more…
This youth-boosting elixir contains an abundance of Australian wildcrafted ingredients that naturally turn back the clock. Kakadu plum, edelweiss, lilli pilli (also known as ripeberry), and acerola cherry are supercharged with antioxidants to enhance visible firmness, support collagen production, and even tone, while shielding against free radical and UV damage. Hyaluronic acid—which holds 1,000 times its weight in water—plumps and hydrates skin.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.

Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Product: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser
About:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A daily gel cleanser with natural fruit exfoliant that thoroughly but gently lifts impurities and unclogs pores while leaving skin soft and hydrated.

Solutions for:
- Pores
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Oiliness

If you want to know more…
The Deep Cleanse oil-free gel lathers into a creamy foam to lift away dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying. It cleanses with amino acids derived from silk gentle enough for even the most delicate skin, leaving skin soft, refreshed, and comfortably hydrated.

The formula harnesses the power of the Japanese luffa fruit, a natural beauty multitasker beloved by Japanese women for centuries. Ground fibers from the fruit exfoliate, helping to turn over dead skin cells while purifying and decongesting pores. The fruit extract also beautifies and conditions skin. Japanese wild rose works to visibly tighten pores and smooth skin texture, while Japanese leopard lily helps minimize excess oil.

What else you need to know:
Harvested under a full autumn moon, the water of luffa fruit has been prized as a favorite natural skincare ingredient in Japan since the Edo period. It is beloved for its clarifying and moisturizing properties. When dried and ground, the fruit gently exfoliates to purify and smooth skin texture—the original inspiration for the modern day loofah sponge. The Deep Cleanse harnesses this time-tested ingredient in this refreshing, easy-to-use daily exfoliating cleanser.

This pure, oil-free formula is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, of TEA.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

Replenishes skin for a soft, hydrated complexion. Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Intense Wrinkle Cream is safe for sensitive skin.

Clinical Results: In a 12-week clinical study of 35 subjects:
- 100% saw smoother, less oily skin with no irritation
- 94% showed an immediate reduction in the appearance of dry fine lines.

A brightening, vitamin C-rich eye crème that targets signs of aging, reducing the look of dark circles while improving concealer application and wear—inspired by makeup artist secret, banana powder.

- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Dark circles

If you want to know more…
Wake up before you makeup. Banana Bright Eye Crème brightens, instantly targets fine lines and wrinkles, and reduces the look of dark circles, delivering age-defying results. Collagen-boosted, it firms and deeply hydrates even as it feels deliciously lightweight. It is formulated with powerful vitamin C to help revive and illuminate the entire eye area over time.
Inspired by the makeup artist must-have—"banana powder"—this subtly sunny cream contains special pigments to instantly brighten and color-correct the eye area. But that’s not all: it creates a smooth, well-rested canvas and improves concealer wear. Dark circles—diminished. Crow’s-feet—conquered. Now, go conquer the day with your refreshed and revived Ole Glow®!

What Else You Need to Know: In addition to making this cream both feather light and nutrient packed, Ole drew inspiration from a makeup artist secret he observed during his years of on-camera work: banana powder. Its pale-yellow tint is designed to quickly brighten and color-correct, making it the perfect prep step for concealer. Plus you’ll love the sweet, energizing citrus scent. This eye cream contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance and was rigorously tested for safety, toxicity, and allergens.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner for 2020. It is also a Women's Health 2018 Beauty Award winner.

Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

About:
What it is: A moisturizer that mattifies and delivers weightless hydration without clogging pores.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Oiliness, and Pores

Formulation: Gel

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Hyaluronic Acid: A humectant that boosts skin’s moisture content, helps skin appear smoother, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
- Oil-Absorbing Microspheres: Mineral powders that impart a matte finish to skin.
- Oil-Absorbing Technology: A blend of active ingredients, featuring niacinamide, that works to absorb sebum, minimize the look of pores, and reduce shine over time.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This ultra-light formula provides optimal hydration for oily skin without leaving a greasy after-feel. Oil-controlling ingredients deliver a powder-soft finish, help minimize the appearance of pores, and keep skin shine-free all day.

Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study:
- 97% reported this product controlled oil and delivered the perfect amount of hydration for their oily skin all day long
- 97% reported hydration that did not feel heavy or greasy after immediate use
- 97% reported an improved appearance of their oily skin after 8 hours

About:
What it is: A gentle oil perfect for new and experienced retinol users that’s balanced with blue tansy to improve the look of wrinkles, surface redness, and pores.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Redness

Formulation: Lightweight Oil

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Retinoid Ester: This advanced retinoid ester fights the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, supports natural skin elasticity, and evens out the look of surface redness.
- Botanical Complex (Blue Tansy and German Chamomile): Soothes skin and the appearance of surface redness.
- Avocado Seed Oil: Great for plumping the look of fine lines and rich in age-defying vitamins B, C, D, E, and A.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Retinoid ester is just as effective as traditional retinol while being much gentler to the skin, making it an ideal choice for people with sensitive skin or new users of retinol. This oil works throughout the night to deliver luminous, visibly even-toned skin by morning. It is formulated with ultra-stable and gentle retinol ester and a complex of lightweight but nutritious oils that soothe the appearance of surface redness for a calm, visibly even-toned complexion.

Clinical Results: After an independent consumer testing panel used Luna Sleeping Night Oil for 4 weeks:
- 100% felt the product absorbed well into the skin
- 96% of women felt their skin looked brighter and more radiant
- 96% of women felt their skin looked healthier and revitalized

About:
What it is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
Highlighted Ingredients:
- Signal Peptide Complex (Growth Factors): Nine signal peptides (made up of amino
acids, which form proteins in the skin) bind moisture to skin—visibly plumping, firming,
and restoring bounce.
- Pygmy Waterlily Stem Cell Extract: An excellent source of antioxidants and nutrients to replenish the skin; extremely moisturizing, soothing, and calming; and effective in supporting healthy-, youthful-looking skin.
- Soybean Folic Acid Ferment Extract: This B vitamin plays a central role in maintaining youthful-, elastic-looking skin. Skin is thirsty for folic acid, especially after exposure to sun.
Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.
What Else You Need to Know: Protini™ restores younger-, revived-looking skin. Lines, wrinkles, and sun damage appear reduced and skin feels strengthened and moisturized. Think of Protini™ like adding protein to your smoothie. Abundant with proteins and nutrients, it replenishes and restores skin to a visibly strong, healthy state. It has a pH of 4.0.
This cream is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
Award Wins:
CEW, 2019 Beauty Awards
Harper‘s BAZAAR, 2019 Anti-Aging Award
Byrdie Beauty, 2019 Skincare Award
Influenster, 2019 Best Indie Facial Moisturizer
Clinical Results: In an independent consumer-testing panel of 50 women ages 25 to 55:
- 100% agreed their skin felt replenished and nourished
- 97% agreed their skin felt moisturized
- 97% agreed their skin texture felt soft and smooth

About:
What it is: A targeted serum-in-moisturizer for post-menopausal women, clinically proven to improve skin’s volume for the appearance of firmer, plumper skin in seven days.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Meno-Reverse Technology: A natural peptide blend that visibly smooths skin’s appearance for a younger look.
- White Pine: Derived from the oldest living trees in Europe, KORRES’ proprietary ingredient powerfully supports protein production, promotes skin elasticity, and visibly improves wrinkles and age spots.
- Abyssinia Oil: Promotes suppleness and volume to help visibly lift sagging skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Menopause causes a loss in 30 percent of collagen. The Volumizing Serum-In-Moisturizer is specifically designed for post-menopausal women and is clinically proven to improve volume for the appearance of firmer, plumper skin in seven days.

Clinical Results:
Clinical study as determined by an expert clinical grader on 36 subjects:
- 97% of post-menopausal women had plumper looking skin in 7 days
- 95% of post-menopausal women had visibly lifted skin, even in the lower cheek (jowls), in 7 days
- The Meno-Reverse™ technology has been proven to reduce the number and volume of wrinkles 11 times more on post-menopausal skin than on pre-menopausal*

*As obtained in an invivo ingredient study

While pursuing renewable energy solutions, a biotechnology laboratory in San Francisco unexpectedly discovered the powerful regenerative properties of Alguronic Acid, the bioactive compound available only in Algenist products.

Research results:
In comparison testing, Alguronic Acid outperformed other well-known active antiaging ingredients, demonstrating superior antiaging benefits. Average results measured following an in vitro test with Alguronic Acid:
- 55% increase in cellular regeneration
- 32% increase in elastin synthesis
- 26% decrease in melanin production
Following a self-assessment of 100 women, within 10 days of daily use:
- Skin density (suppleness, elasticity) is restored in 86% of subjects.
- Skin radiance is boosted in 93% of subjects.
Within 4 weeks of daily use:
- Deep wrinkles are minimized in 78% of subjects.
- Skin is noticeably tightened and lifted in 81% of subjects.

What Else You Need to Know: This all-in-one treatment includes a color-changing capsule to cover blemishes and neutralize redness, restoring fatigued skin for a vibrant appearance. The formula features Tiger Grass (Centella Asiatica) to help heal sensitive skin exhibiting inflammation, irritation or discomfort.

The Cicapair™ Collection is inspired by the true legend of Asian tigers, rolling in centella asiatica to heal their battle wounds. Also known as tiger grass, its medicinal use has been recognized for centuries. For generations, this active ingredient has also been recognized as a recovery system to help support wounded skin exhibiting inflammation, redness, or blemishes.

This product is free from 10 harmful ingredients such as artificial fragrance or color, denatured alcohol, triethanolamine, sulfate-based surfactants, triclosan, mineral oil, propylene glycol, and DEA that causes skin irritation.
ingredients:

Product: Sweet Biome™ Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray
About:
What it is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness

Formulation: Spray

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate (Fermented Sake): Defends against free-radical damage and supports a strong skin barrier.
- Sodium PCA: An electrolyte with antioxidant benefits that maintains skin hydration levels.
- Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment (Kombucha): A powerful barrier restorative with antioxidant benefits.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: The Sweet Biome™ Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray is your anytime balancing and replenishing solution for a visibly stronger, healthier acid mantle and microbiome. Use it to recharge your skin with substances that defend against biome bullies— pollution, blue light, and UV-generated environmental free radicals and irritants—and help restore hydration and moisture levels.

This product has a pH level of 4.5 and is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Product: All-Physical Dark Spot Sun Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50
About:
What it is: An all-physical facial sunscreen that helps prevent damage from UVA/UVB rays, reduces the appearance of dark spots, and protects against photo-aging without the use of chemical filters.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Uneven Texture

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide: Mineral sun filters that sit on top of skin to scatter, reflect, and absorb UVA/UVB rays; they are the only sunscreens with the ability to reflect and mitigate the effects of blue light (HEV).
- Black Rice Extract: Potent antioxidant that simultaneously targets collagen degradation while supporting collagen Type I production.
- Mela-C Complex (Melatonin and Vitamins C and E): A precise blend of melatonin, three different forms of vitamin C, and vitamin E that work together to prevent visible hyperpigmentation and dark spots, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and target collagen breakdown.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging and is reef-safe.

What Else You Need to Know: This hydrating SPF 50 is the highest FDA-allowed level of sun protection available. Your first line of defense against photo-aging and sun damage, this all-physical SPF reduces the appearance of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and signs of aging around the face. The melatonin defense complex features melatonin as well as three forms of vitamin C and one form of vitamin E, and potent antioxidants to fight free-radical damage and minimize and target the appearance of hyperpigmentation, fine lines, and wrinkles.

Product: Stress Repair Face Cream with Niacinamide
About:
What it is: A nutrient-rich face cream containing niacinamide (B3), superfoods, and adaptogens to treat visible signs of stress-induced aging.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness

Formulation: Lightweight Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Niacinamide (B3): Supports lipid barrier function to retain moisture, improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles, and reduce the appearance of redness and breakouts.
- Shatavari: Supports skin’s resilience to stress, prevent free radical damage, and supports collagen.
- Avocado: This nutrient-dense superfood supports hyaluronic acid production and softens skin—resulting in hydrated and more youthful-looking skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Unique cold-preserved B3Adaptive SuperFoods™ Complex delivers avocado, kiwi, cordyceps mushroom, and kakadu plum via double wall microencapsulation to help increase skin's resilience to stress. This deeply hydrating, noncomedogenic, hypoallergenic formula brightens and smooths away the appearance of worry lines for healthier-looking skin.

Clinical Results: In an independent clinical study:
- 100% saw an immediate significant clinical improvement in hydration
- 96% saw a significant clinical improvement in skin smoothness in 2 weeks
- 88% saw a significant clinical improvement in skin redness and radiance in 2 weeks

What it is:
A detoxifying, cooling clay mask that instantly reduces the look of pores, smooths skin texture, and controls oil all day.

Solutions for:
- Pores
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Oiliness

If you want to know more…
Take the plunge for smaller-looking pores—instantly. Deeply purify and diminish pores with an exhilarating chill. Inspired by the "cold plunge" part of a Scandinavian sauna cycle, this cooling clay mask detoxifies, controls oil, and reduces the look of pores. The innovative formula harnesses the power of alpine willow herb and snow lotus—antioxidant-rich botanicals that have adapted to thrive in extreme cold—to soothe, mattify, and refine pores. Add cool water, and the turquoise clay mask thaws into a luxurious lather that sweeps away excess oil and impurities. With AHA and BHA, the mask unveils dramatically improved skin texture. Balance is restored as Green Fusion Complex™ and neem seed oil help replenish the skin and you see a refreshed, refined and purified Ole Glow®.

What else you need to know:
In Ole’s homeland of Scandinavia, saunas are revered as a place of both physical and mental relaxation, believed to improve circulation and detoxify. A cycle begins with a hot sauna session, followed by a plunge into a nearby lake, sea, or swimming pool to cool down.

Research results:
In an independent, clinical study on 37 women using Cold Plunge Pore Mask:
- 94% of users experienced an instant reduction in oil by an average of 73%

In a consumer study on 37 women, after 1 week:
- 100% of users agreed this product removes dirt, oil, and impurities
- 100% of users agreed this product detoxifies skin
- 100% of users agreed this product reduces oil
- 100% of users agreed this product leaves skin looking smooth all day
- 100% of users agreed this product improves the look of skin throughout the day
- 97% of users agreed this product unclogs and reduces the look of pores
- 95% of users agreed this product deeply purifies pores
- 95% of users agree this product controls oil all day

About:
What it is: A line of lightweight, vitamin-enriched masks formulated with 93 percent of ingredients from natural origin.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores, Dryness, Dullness, and Oiliness

Formulation: Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Extract of Watermelon from Europe (Watermelon Mask): Full of water and a source of vitamins, helping to maintain skin’s hydration.
- Matcha Tea (Matcha Mask): Full of minerals and amino acids, helping to purify and mattify the skin.
- European Grapefruit (Grapefruit Mask): A source of amino acids, helping to preserve skin's radiance and to unify the complexion.
- Coconut Milk (Coconut Mask): A source of minerals, proteins, and amino acids, known for their soothing and hydrating properties.

Ingredient Callouts: These products come in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: These face-and-body vitamin masks are full to the brim with vitamins, just like summer fruit. All contain a cocktail of plant-based super ingredients and a vitamin (selected for their natural richness and recognized skincare properties) for immediate and lasting beauty-boosting results. Each has an ultra-light texture that’s easy to apply to face, neck, décolleté, or any other areas that need it.

Do your face and body skin need a boost of radiance or do they need to be soothed, hydrated, or purified? Choose the mask your face and body need most. Each vitamin mask boasts its own special benefits: Watermelon + Vitamin E provides an immediate, intense, lasting shot of hydration for toned skin that looks and feels restored and replenished. Matcha Tea + Vitamin H is an intense purifier that rids skin of excess sebum and reduces the appearance of pores, resulting in cleaner, mattified skin. Coconut Milk + Vitamin B3 is a soothing combination to relieve and soothe tight skin, reducing the appearance of redness caused by dry skin, visibly softening, and bringing lasting comfort. Grapefruit + Vitamin C is a visible radiance booster that fights dullness and signs of tiredness for a more luminous complexion.

Plus, each mask comes in a recyclable jar made with 79 percent plastic produced from sugarcane residuals.

Get glowing skin instantly with Fresh Vitamin Nectar Vibrancy-Boosting Face Mask. What Else You Need to Know: Give this peel five minutes, and it’ll give you visibly glowing skin. Using a double-exfoliation method, this transformative formula smooths the look of texture and imparts a visible brightening effect. alpyn beauty consciously harvests its PlantGenius® Fresh Mountain Actives™ from Jackson Hole, Wyoming. Hardworking and resilient, these wild botanicals are conditioned to survive in a harsh climate. When applied to skin, they perform just like they do in the wild: by nurturing, protecting, and supporting. Additionally, alpyn beauty is a certified plastic-neutral brand (every product purchase contributes to ocean cleanup to offset its plastic footprint) and a committed member of 1% for the Planet, with one percent of product proceeds going to national park restoration.

All alpyn beauty products are formulated without phenoxyethanol.

Product: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial™ AHA + BHA Mask
About:
What it is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
Formulation: Lightweight Mask
Highlighted Ingredients:
- 25% AHA Blend (glycolic + (T) tartaric, (L) lactic, (C) citric acids): Exfoliates dead surface skin cells and revs up surface turnover to smooth and brighten the appearance of skin.
- Salicylic Acid (BHA) 2%: Penetrates to exfoliate and unclog inside pores as well as on the surface of the skin, providing greater visible skin clarity while soothing redness.
- Chickpea Flour: Balances and brightens skin‘s appearance while combating visible dullness.
What Else You Need to Know: Created with all skin in mind, Babyfacial‘s 25 percent AHA/2 percent BHA blend gently exfoliates the pore lining and resurfaces by removing dead skin cells. With an ideal pH level of 3.5, glycolic, tartaric, lactic, citric, and salicylic acids work together to ensure higher efficacy without visible redness and sensitization.
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
Award Wins:
-Glamour, 2019 Glamour Beauty Award
-Martha Steward Living, 2019 Living Editor's Pick
-Harpers Bazaar, 2019 Anti-Aging Award
Clinical Results: In an independent consumer-testing panel of 104 women ages 25 to 55:
- 95% found skin appeared revived
- 94% found skin to be deeply cleansed and resurfaced
- 93% found skin texture baby-soft and smooth
- 93% found skin appeared brighter and radiant
- 92% found skin appeared to have a healthy glow and boosted clarity
- 91% felt skin appeared fresh and youthful
- 90% found skin appeared clearer and more even

About:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive

What it is:
A creamy anti-aging mask—packed with Japanese beautyberry, two types of vitamin C, and AHAs from seven fruits—that unveils softer, glowing skin.

Solutions for:
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Dark spots and uneven skin tone
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
Reveal remarkably softer, smoother skin with this creamy rinse-off treatment mask. The formula features two types of vitamin C: a water-soluble vitamin C derivative that absorbs quickly for an immediate glow and an oil-soluble vitamin C derivative that remains in skin longer, providing antioxidant protection from UV damage for a brighter, more even-toned appearance over time. The mask is also powered by the Japanese beautyberry, a superfruit rich in antioxidants that was found to stabilize vitamin C, maximizing its effectiveness. A gentle 10 percent AHA complex of seven fruits removes debris and the buildup of dead skin cells to visibly improve skin texture and support the natural production of new skin cells. Tatcha's signature trio of Japanese anti-aging superfoods—green tea, rice, and algae—helps to restore a more youthful appearance.

What else you need to know:
One of the geisha’s most beloved beauty secrets for radiant skin was a face pack—an intensive rinse-off treatment made from fresh fruits and botanicals. This time-tested practice inspired the Violet-C Radiance Mask, a modern treatment for smooth, glowing skin. This product is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.

Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

What it is:
A bubbling mask that exfoliates skin, evens out the appearance of skin tone, and helps deeply clear out pores.

Solutions for:
- Pores
- Uneven skin tone
- Dullness and uneven texture

If you want to know more…
See fresh, smooth, clear skin with this innovative bubbling mask that exfoliates skin’s surface and evens out the appearance of skin tone. The two-step Dermask Ultra Jet Peeling Solution mask is formulated with carbonic acid powder infused with carbon dioxide which activates to help deeply penetrate and clear out pores. A blend of sugar scrub and fruit acids, including papaya enzymes, help to gently resurface skin and even out the complexion. Soothing allantoin and olive oil give comfort and add moisture to skin, leaving it soft and cushiony. The innovative, cellulose sheet mask has a natural violet hue that changes color to indicate the shift in your skin’s pH balance.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is free from harmful ingredients that cause skin irritation such as artificial fragrance or color, denatured alcohol, triethanolamine, sulfate-based surfactants, triclosan, mineral oil, propylene glycol, and DEA. This product is also hypoallergenic-tested.
ingredients:
-Papain: Softens skin texture.
-Betaine Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates skin.
-AHA Complex: Grape, orange, apple, lime, and lemon extracts help to even out skin tone and support natural cell turn over.
-Allatoin: Moisturizes skin.

About:
What it is: A set of calming and richly hydrating face masks packed with the potent ingredient purslane to hydrate and support the body’s natural skin renewal.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Redness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Aloe Vera and Chamomile: Provide intense moisture and calm the skin.
- Purslane: A strong antioxidant that stimulates the body and supports skin health and rejuvenation.
- Kaolin: Leaves the skin with a silky-soft feel.

Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This deeply hydrating Face Mask is perfect for traveling or whenever your stressed skin needs an instant hydration boost. Purslane, a strong antioxidant, also stimulates the body to form telomerase enzymes, thus supporting the body’s natural skin regeneration. Calming aloe vera and chamomile infuse the mask with moisture while kaolin, also known as ‘China clay,’ leaves your complexion feeling silky-soft and supple.

As an aesthetic doctor with a background in anti-inflammatory medicine, Dr. Sturm is committed to treating the skin with scientifically-proven ingredients and non-aggressive natural extracts. The three pillars of Dr. Barbara Sturm Molecular Cosmetics—hydration, boosting the skin’s natural barrier function, and reducing the visible signs of irritation—help to promote healthy skin that glows from within over time.

This Set Contains:
- 7 x 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Face Mask Satchets

Product: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm
About:
What it is: An award-winning makeup-removing face cleanser that melts away stubborn makeup, SPF, dirt, and oil and leaves skin hydrated with zero residue

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Sunflower and Ginger Root Oils: Melt even stubborn makeup (including long-wear) without stripping or drying skin.
- Turmeric and Moringa Extract: Help remove impurities, sunscreen residue, and fight the effects of pollution.
- Papaya Enzymes: Naturally exfoliate pores.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This holy grail cleansing balm instantly melts away makeup, including long-wear and stubborn eye makeup, effortlessly without stripping skin or leaving a residue. It removes sunscreen, impurities, excess oil, and gently exfoliates while leaving skin hydrated and smooth. It transforms from a sorbet-like balm to silky oil to milky lather—all to remove makeup effortlessly with zero residue. Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm does not contain polyethylene microbeads. The polyethylene is not in a solid form and melts with water as it is washed down the drain.

Limited Edition Sweet Apple Clean - Infused with apple extract, this two-layered formula has a vibrant, pink-toned surface with a golden yellow core. A nourishing makeup remover and cleanser in one, it instantly melts makeup, spf, dirt, excess oil, and pollution residue for smooth, hydrated skin. Vegan and cruelty-free.

This product is also an Allure Best of Beauty Winner.

Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study of 35 subjects:
- 92.4% felt of users felt that Green Clean left their face feeling clean and fresh
- 90.9% of users felt Green Clean removed their makeup effectively
- 92.4% of users felt Green Clean helped their face feel calm, soothed, and comfortable

About:
What it is: A cooling, quenching overnight mask that visibly plumps and restores with an electrolyte cocktail while helping to support the skin’s acid mantle.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Four-Electrolyte Blend: With antioxidant-rich and powerful humectant ingredients (coconut water, sodium PCA, magnesium PCA, and prickly pear extract), electrolytes are vital to helping maintain hydration levels in skin, supporting barrier strength and lipid content, calming redness, and protecting against environmental dehydration.
- Vitamin F: Soothing fatty acids (linolenic and linoleic) play a vital role in maintaining hydration levels and improving skin texture and suppleness while reducing visible irritation and supporting acid-mantle strength.
- Niacinamide: Also known as vitamin B3, niacinamide has a wide range of benefits, most notably its ability to improve visible signs of aging including fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmness as well as uneven tone and texture.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Barrier-replenishing ingredients niacinamide, sodium PCA, plant squalane, ceramides, omega fatty acids, and antioxidants rehydrate hungover, parched skin, making it soft and supple and improving visible signs of damage and uneven texture and tone. Vitamin F beads deliver extra emollience and soothing hydration.

This mask is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Product: YOUTHMUD® Glow Stimulating & Exfoliating Treatment Mask
About:
What it is: A skin-transforming clay mud mask that intensely exfoliates for softer, smoother, and more glowing skin in as little as ten minutes.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Formulation: Mask

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Volcanic Rock: Multi-level surface exfoliator buffs away dead skin cell buildup, smooths uneven skin texture, and softens the look of fine lines.
- Natural Clay Blend: Gently absorbs impurities and excess oils.
- TEAOXI® Green Tea Leaf: Infuses mud with antioxidants from whole tea leaves.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. This product is also vegan and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Reboot your glow with the mask that started a masking revolution. YOUTHMUD® exfoliates with volcanic pumice rock to help smooth the appearance of fine lines and visibly soften skin’s texture, while natural clays lift impurities without disturbing skin’s essential oils. Antioxidants from green tea leaves brighten and smooth for visibly firmer, more glowing, youthful-looking skin instantly.

Founder Blurb: Co-founders Shannon and Glenn Dellimore were enjoying a casual evening with friends in the Hollywood Hills when an actor friend asked if anyone knew of a product that made skin instantly camera-ready. The verdict was unanimous: other than time-consuming facials that took weeks (even months), nothing gave instant glowing results. With willing celebrities as test subjects, they set out to create a solution. After researching, they found a small, family-owned lab to make the formula, filled it in plain-white sample jars at home and hand-delivered it. Wowed by the results, word spread fast in Hollywood. Top entertainment executives, A-list actors, musicians, and celebrity makeup artists all called requesting the "no-name magic mud." Within a year, it was used all over Hollywood. Knowing they had made something that made skin glow and everyone feel glamorous, GLAMGLOW® and YOUTHMUD® were born.

Clinical Results: In a consumer survey of 105 participants:
- 97% said skin immediately looked and felt smoother after 1 use
- 95% said skin is immediately left looking and feeling renewed after 1 use
- 94% said skin immediately looked healthier after 1 use
- 94% said skin looked more even after 1 week of use
- 90% said skin looked younger after 1 week of use

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Do the night thing. Wash off the day with Beste™ No. 9 Jelly Cleanser, then follow with a smoothie of T.L.C. Framboos™ Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum and Protini™ Polypeptide Moisturizer. To top it all off, smooth on the F-Balm™ Electrolyte Waterfacial Mask.

Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

This Set Contains:
- 1 oz/ 30 mL T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum (full size)
- 1 oz/ 30 mL Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser

About:

An original brightening face mask for a radiant, even complexion.

This rejuvenating mask is inspired by iontophoresis, a beauty treatment that saturates skin with a generous amount of brightening ingredients. Through the power of Ion Force Technology, the brightening ingredients are absorbed deep within the skin for highly effective results. Remove the mask and see a refreshed, bright, and even skin tone.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

- 80% of women reported skin became brighter

Fresh Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask is an intensely moisturizing treatment that lifts your nighttime ritual to new heights. This sleeping mask acts like a corset for your complexion, giving you a lifted, firmer look by morning.

A proprietary complex of kombucha (black tea ferment), black tea extract, blackberry leaf extract, and lychee seed extract is proven to inhibit damaging free radicals and helps improve the appearance of skin elasticity. The overnight mask also features belle de nuit extract to soothe and rebalance the skin, peptides to help firm the skin and visibly defy the signs of gravity, and hyaluronic acid to attract and maintain moisture to enhance suppleness.

"Infused with our proprietary black tea complex and soothing belle de nuit, nature’s ‘flower of the night,’ this intensely moisturizing mask is designed to work with your skin’s nightly recovery process to visibly lift and contour the complexion."—Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder

Research results:
In a 28-day consumer test on 32 subjects:
- 94% noticed their skin was more supple and radiant after 2 weeks

Beauty tips:
- This overnight face mask is like contouring without makeup for any day you need a more lifted look.
- Use Fresh Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask to prep for a big event the next day.
- For extra nourishment, use after your moisturizer as the last step of your nighttime ritual.
- Follow this massage technique to elevate the experience and benefits: start with your neck, massaging the face mask in upward sweeping motions from your collarbone to your jawline and repeat three times. Then, move on to your face, applying upward from your chin to your forehead.

About:
What it is: A mask with 1,000 sizes of hyaluronic acid to recharge dry skin, replenish lost moisture, and deliver thirst-quenching hydration.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture

Formulation: LightweightGel

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Hyaluronic Acid Complex: A unique blend of 1,000 different micro and macro molecular sizes of hyaluronic acid (HA) work on multiple levels to hydrate from the inside out; smaller sizes of HA deliver plumping, youth-giving hydration that helps minimize the look of wrinkles, while larger sizes of HA deliver conditioning moisture that helps smooth and soften skin texture.
- Tremella Mushroom: Holds up to 1,000 times its weight in water, which helps skin lock-in moisture, supports barrier function, and smooths the look of skin texture.
- Australian Coastal Flower Blend: A combination of kangaroo paw flower, red spider flower, and candle stick flower provides natural sources of antioxidants, ellagic acid, and ferulic acid to brighten, even skin tone, and minimize the look of redness.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also cruelty-free. *Ingredients from Organic farming.

What Else You Need to Know: This gel formula delivers a surge of moisture with 13 ingredients for hydration, 12 ingredients for soothing redness, and 18 ingredients for vitamins and minerals.

Tata Harper Skincare is partnering with Trees for the Future for two years to plant 100,000 trees, revitalize 100 acres, sequester 3,616 tons of carbon, and plant 1,000 people out of poverty.

Clinical Results: Transepidermal Water Loss shown in a clinical study of 33 women, ages 36-75:
- Up to 46% increase in skin moisture content 24 hours after application
- Up to 27% increase in skin moisture content immediately after application

Measurements of redness intensity and total redness in a clinical study of 33 women ages 33-75:
- Up to 95% reduction in total area of skin redness 8 hours after application

About:
What it is: A gentle cleanser to remove makeup, excess oil, pollution, and grime that rinses away without residue, leaving skin clean and soft.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Redness

Formulation: Lightweight Gel

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Mild Surfactant Blend: A stack of mild cleansing agents, including coconut-based surfactants rich in fatty acids that work together to create a gentle lather that effectively dissolves even stubborn makeup, sunscreen, and oils while supporting a healthy-looking skin barrier.
- Glycerin: A skin-identical humectant that replenishes hydration levels normally lost during the cleansing process.
- Cantaloupe Fruit Extract: Rich in antioxidants, this extract soothes and hydrates.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: With a unique blend of mild surfactants and makeup-dissolving emollients, this gentle cleanser is formulated at an ideal, non-stripping pH level of 5.5. Free of SLS, fragrance, essential oils, and silicones, Beste™ No. 9 is appropriate for all skin.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

ingredients:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply to just-cleansed skin, avoiding eye area.

Fresh, Healthy-Looking Skin in Three Steps:
-Prep: Apply Vitamin Enriched Face Base to hydrate, smooth, and prime skin for makeup application.
-Correct: Apply Corrector (sold separately) to areas of discoloration under the eye using the Concealer Blending Brush (sold separately), getting as close to the lash line and innermost corner as possible. Gently blend with your finger, and layer concealer on top.
-Perfect: Using the Full Coverage Face Brush (sold separately), buff Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation SPF 15 (sold separately) onto skin, starting at the center of the face and blending outward.

- Nourishing Oil Blend: A mix of moisturizing and lightweight oils (marula seed, baobab seed, kalahari melon seed, mongongo, and ximenia) that protects and nurtures the skin.

What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with antioxidant-rich fruit extracts and a soothing and nourishing blend of African oils, this balm cleanser transforms from an oil to a milk to cleanse and moisturize, leaving behind a dewy glow.

This cleanser is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Awards:
- Women‘s Health, 2019 Healthy Skin Awards
- Refinery 29, 2019 Feature Story
- InStyle, 2019 InStyle Beauty Award
- Allure, 2019 Best of Beauty

About:
What it is: A moisturizing, nourishing balm that visibly volumizes and rejuvenates super-delicate lips.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Avocado Oil: An excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamins A, D, and E that provides intense moisture and softens rough, chapped skin.
- Mongongo Oil: Intensely moisturizes and helps to maintain skin‘s healthy barrier function.
- Tripeptide-1: Hydrates and visibly plumps up the lips to give better-looking definition to the lip line.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Spiked with avocado and mongongo nut oils plus a tripeptide and sea fern algae, this buttery balm provides a visibly plumper, better-defined lip line and softens rough, parched lips. Additionally, antioxidant-rich green tea leaf and vitamin C neutralize environmental aggressors that cause premature, visible signs of aging.

This lip balm is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

If you want to know more…
This nourishing eye cream provides the ultimate sculpting and firming effect to visibly transform the delicate eye area. Alguronic acid—a patented compound produced from microalgae—and propeptide3—a unique and powerful complex of functional proteins and active peptides—combine to help hydrate the area around the eyes, visibly lift the upper eyelid, and visibly strengthen skin density and elasticity. Gold works as a delivery system to increase the potency and efficacy for polypeptides. These extremely effective antiaging polypeptides act as collagen boosters to significantly reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Optical diffusers blur imperfections and brighten the eye area for a smooth and youthful look.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product does not contain synthetic dyes, GMOs, triclosan, or alcohol. It is noncomedogenic, dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, and for all skin types.

Research results:

- 98% of subjects reported eye makeup application was smooth and seamless
- 94% of subjects reported eye cream immediately restores essential moisture to the delicate eye area

After 10 days of use:
- 95% of subjects reported eye cream visibly improves skin texture around the eyes

After 28 days of use:
- 98% of subjects reported the eye area appears noticeably revived and more supple
- 97% of subjects reported eye cream blurs imperfections and visibly brightens eye area
