What it is:
A moisturizer with breakthrough Telo-5™ technology that supports antiaging, targeting the appearance of wrinkles, fines lines, and the signs of aging.

What it is formulated to do:
As we age, fine lines, wrinkles, dryness, and sagging skin occur. Age Arrest’s advanced formula is improves the appearance of skin’s firmness and elasticity, skin discoloration, while it significantly moisturizes skin. Its revolutionary Telo-5™ Technology, based on Nobel Prize* winning research on the youthful benefits of prolonging the life of telomeres, is designed to reduce the signs of aging and deliver a rejuvenated, youthful-looking complexion. An integral third step in Kate Somerville’s three Steps to Glowing Skin, moisturizing is key to achieving glowing, radiant skin.

- 90% of women reported highly significant improvement in skin firmness and elasticity
- 93% of women reported highly significant improvement in skin discoloration and skin tone evenness

About:

About: What it is:  An ultra-moisturizing ritual with a CBD-infused face cream and oil to visibly rebalance and hydrate your skin. WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including △9 -Tetrahydrocannabinol (△9 -THC), which is known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. About: What it is:  A supercharged body lotion that exfoliates to restore the look of dull and uneven areas while replenishing dehydrated skin with moisturizing butters and electrolytes. Highlighted Ingredients:- T.L.C. Framboos™ AHA Blend (Glycolic, Tartaric, Lactic, and Citric Acids): Visibly resurfaces dull, uneven skin for a smoother, brighter, more even look. - Marula Butter: A super-pure, concentrated butter derived from marula oil, which is rich in antioxidant polyphenols, lipids, and fatty acids, which thoroughly moisturize skin and provide powerful barrier protection.- Shea Butter: A concentrated shea-fruit-derived butter with a complex triglyceride composition responsible for its characteristically rich, emollient, skin-barrier-protecting properties.What Else You Need to Know: With a pH of 3.5 and a blend of glycolic, tartaric, citric, and salicylic acids, this body lotion gently smooths rough, bumpy skin while visibly improving areas of uneven tone. Supercharged with ingredients that go beyond delivering simple moisture, the formula supports and replenishes the skin barrier and restores its water content.Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and is free of sulfates, silicones, essential oils, fragrance, dyes, and drying alcohols. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

About: Skin type:✔ Normal✔ Dry✔ Combination✔ OilyWhat it is: A shine-stopping, pore-diffusing primer that smooths the way for better foundation application and longer wear with an instant retouch effect.What it does: Nothing is sexier than touch-worthy skin. Pro Filt’r Instant Retouch Primer is the first step to getting there. Paired with Pro Filt'r Foundation, this oil-free primer smooths away the look of pores, visibly evens skin tone and texture, and instantly absorbs shine without feeling dry or chalky. That means smoother foundation application and longer makeup wear. Unlike a basic mattifying primer, Pro Filt’r’s cushiony, touch-me-now texture mattifies skin with the lightest possible feel for a full-on sensorial experience. The universal invisipink™ formula creates a filter-like blurring effect and melts instantly into all skin tones without a trace. Pro Filt’r works all day to help makeup last longer, and feel lightweight and comfortable, so you don’t have to worry about your skin—and you’ll be ready for anything.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: For Rihanna, creating the perfect soft matte base is the most important part of any look—and the first step to the Fenty Face, her real-life method for killer radiance. "I wanted this primer to feel soft and moisturizing at the same time, as well as do the job of keeping makeup on."—Rihanna, Brand Founder Fenty Beauty is 100 percent cruelty-free.

About:

- Jojoba Oil: Rich in antioxidants, jojoba quickly absorbs into the skin to nourish and hydrate.
- Rosehip Oil: Packed with skin beauty essentials like vitamins, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids, rosehip oil visibly firms and brightens skin while leaving it feeling supple and soft.
- Wildcrafted Buriti Oil: Native to Brazil, this oil is rich with vitamins that offer super-potent antioxidant protection.

About: What it is:  A revolutionary, custom-blend hydrator that gives you the power to hydrate your way.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dark SpotsFormulation: Lightweight GelIngredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know:  This collection allows for the custom hydration. Begin by picking your hydration base, add a cartridge to address your main skin concern, and you’re done; there are over 20 combinations designed for all skin types. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. How do I know if this tint works with my skin tone? Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide to see if BB-gel is a good fit for you. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones, but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones, you’ll see a hint of tint, on others, a sunkissed look. Clinique does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones. Apply BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation. A little goes a long way.

Infused with a nourishing blend of vitamins B, C, and E, aloe vera, and caffeine, the hydrating formulation creates a tanned, toned look and blurs imperfections by reducing the appearance of redness, cellulite, and spider veins. About:
What it is: An innovative, spade-like brush head for targeted application to the apples of the cheeks.

What Else You Need to Know: The spade-like brush head allows for precise application and blending, making it the perfect tool for blush, contour, and powder application. Slightly dense, the soft bristles are perfect for cream blush.

The PRO Brush Collection is made up of 30 brushes with the highest-quality, hand-shaped vegan synthetic bristles. The tapered artistry handles help offer ultimate control in makeup application to help you create any makeup look you desire. This brush and its holder have been developed responsibly. The paper of the packaging and the wood of the handle are made of sustainably managed forests.
ingredients:
Suggested Usage:
-To apply blush color, gently load one side or the tip of the brush and blend using quick, upward-sweeping motions. Use the other side to blend and sheer product.
-When contouring, use the tip of the brush to sweep product on. The tapered edges both apply and deposit product quickly on the face.

How to clean your brushes:
-Bristles hold onto oils, excess product, debris, and bacteria, which can ultimately lead to unwanted breakouts and skin irritation. Cleaning your brushes can extend the life of the bristles and make for a better makeup application and blending.
-To switch between blush shades, use the Color Switch by Vera Mona (sold separately).
-For a daily clean, spray Refresh Daily Brush Cleaner (sold separately) onto a dry towel or cloth (not on bristles) and wipe gently using circular motions.
-Deep cleanse brushes at least once a month with Detox Deep-Cleaning Brush and Sponge Shampoo (sold separately).

About:
What it is:
An intensely hydrating lip balm, rich in camellia oil, that absorbs quickly, leaving lips soft and touchable with a hint of 23-karat golden shimmer.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
This moisturizing balm is rich in camellia oil, which has been prized in Asia for centuries for its superb ability to help seal in moisture. The formula is packed with antioxidants and essential fatty acids to help nourish and protect. Crushed 23-Karat Gold flakes leave a subtle gleam on lips.

What else you need to know:
For 2,000 years, camellia oil has been treasured by geisha and Japanese women because of how it nourishes skin, leaving it glowing but never oily. They learned of its incredible benefits from Ama, Japanese female free divers who spend four hours a day, every day harvesting treasures from the sea wearing only a loin cloth. To protect their skin and hair from the salty, cold ocean water, they coat their skin with camellia oil. This beauty secret has been advanced for the lips by the Tatcha Institute in Japan with the Goldspun Camellia Lip Balm.

This product is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA.

Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

About:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal

An intensely nourishing night cream (or mask) that deeply moisturizes, soothes redness and irritation, and boosts firmness and elasticity.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Redness
- Fine lines and wrinkles

If you want to know more…
This luxurious night cream repairs, rejuvenates, and nourishes skin with wildcrafted botanicals. Shea and cocoa butters work to moisturize and support natural collagen production, vitamin E promotes healing and cellular turnover, B vitamins work to soothe redness and inflammation, and lemon aspen enhances firmness and elasticity. An abundance of antioxidants—including vitamin C—from pomegranate and acai fight free radicals and deliver a brightening, youth-boosting action. Plus, it’s divinely scented with coconut and rose for an ultra-pampering experience.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.

Product: Wing Man Liver Detox and Dark Circle Supplement
About: Beauty Benefit: Gut HealthWhat it is:  A supplement for full liver support—so you don’t have to refuse that glass of chardonnay. What it Tastes Like: No flavor When to Expect Results: Four to six weeksWhat Else You Need to Know: Protect your organs, visibly diminish dark under-eye circles, and cleanse your system with this supportive supplement. Milk thistle (containing potent and powerful silymarin), dandelion root, and artichoke leaf combine for a full-on liver detox—perfect for the party animal in all of us*. Silymarin, the active compound in milk thistle, may contribute to the liver’s antioxidant defense by enhancing glutathione. Milk thistle has been clinically shown to help regenerate liver cells and support detox mechanisms. Research has also looked into silymarin as a potent antioxidant—a compound that blocks the action of cell-damaging free radicals. A clinical study found that humans who consumed dandelion extract over a 24-hour period produced significantly more urine than they had in each of the previous two days. Some preliminary research suggests that dandelion may help support liver and gallbladder function. Limited trials found artichoke-leaf extract to have a modest positive effect on cholesterol levels. Antioxidant, bile-enhancing, and lipid-lowering effects have been demonstrated as well, which corresponds with the historical use of the plant. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
ingredients: -Silymarin: Clinically shown to regenerate liver cells and support detox mechanisms. -Dandelion Root and Artichoke Leaf: Provide digestive support. Milk Thistle Extract, Dandelion Root, Artichoke Leaf, Cellulose Powder, Silica, Magnesium.

About:
What it is: A visibly age-defying set with a sound-wave device to visibly firm and contour skin, a hydrating gel to enhance the glide of the device, a weightless moisturizer, and the cult-favorite Retinol Reform® serum to smooth the look of wrinkles and boost the appearance of brightness for visibly glowing skin. 

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Puffiness

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Acoustic Sound Waves (Facial Sculpting Wand): Travel beneath the skin's surface to target wrinkles on a deeper level.
- Encapsulated Retinol (Retinol Reform): A nonirritating form of retinol that visibly improves fine lines, texture, and elasticity.
- Lactic Acid (Retinol Reform): Exfoliates to address texture and uneven tone for visibly smoother, brighter skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Bring home the same soothing vibration used in Shani's signature facial for a firmer look in as little as seven days. The sleek Facial Sculpting Wand harnesses breakthrough sound-wave technology to target wrinkles on a deeper level—up to 2.4 inches below the skin’s surface. The Precision Ball Attachment targets nasolabial lines and crow's feet, while the Flat Disc Attachment tackles the forehead and jowls. The device addresses seven facial zones with three intensity levels for numerous visible results. Follow your PM Facial Sculpting Wand session with Retinol Reform, which delivers a consistent stream of retinol throughout the night to visibly minimize irritation commonly experienced with retinol products. The formula also contains lactic acid for visibly smoothing and brightening benefits that appear in as little as two weeks.

Retinol Reform® is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

This Set Contains:
- Facial Sculpting Wand
- Flat Disc Attachment
- Precision Ball Attachment
- USB Plug
- USB-C Charging Cable
- 1 oz/ 30 mL Hydra Prep Soothing & Hydrating Gel
- 1 oz/ 30 mL Retinol Reform
- 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Weightless Oil-Free Moisturizer

Clinical Results: Facial Sculpting Wand:
In an independent, self-reported consumer-perception survey of 31 candidates after 7 days of daily use:
- 71% started to see improvements in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
- 74% felt their forehead lines appeared smoother
- 80% agreed their muscles felt relaxed after use

Retinol Reform:
In a 12-week clinical study with visual evaluation and instrumental measurement conducted on 35 women (ages 25 to 50):
- 93% saw an improvement in texture
- 90% reported more even skin tone
- 83% said their skin looked brighter

About:
What it is: A pre-, during-, and post-flight, travel-size skincare routine featuring six Dr. Barbara Sturm products.

Skin Type: Dry

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture

Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: These products prevent dull-looking skin while providing hydration throughout changing air conditions while flying to leave skin looking fresh when you arrive at your destination. The six-step skincare routine comes complete in a chic, holographic travel bag featuring deluxe-size products including the Cleanser, Anti-Pollution Drops, Face Cream Rich, Face Mask, Super Anti-Aging Serum, and Calming Serum. For 30 years, celebrity hairstylist Chris McMillan has worked with every recognizable head of hair in Hollywood. But he could never find a product to do what he wanted: bring hair back to its strongest, healthiest state. So he collaborated with his childhood friend who also happens to be the founder of Drunk Elephant. Together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp—products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with coconut-based cleansers and shine-boosting amino acids. The rest just grew from there.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Clean at Sephora
Clean at Sephora is a curation of brands committed to evolving the beauty industry. When you see our Clean seal, you can be sure this brand's products are formulated without certain ingredients that are potentially harmful to human health and the environment and also address ingredients clients are concerned about, including phthalates, formaldehyde or formaldehyde releasers, oxybenzone and octinoxate, hydroquinone, triclosan, coal tar, methylisothiazolinone and methylchloroisothiazolinone, insoluble plastic microbeads, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

- Marula Oil: This super-absorbable oil, high in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9, helps moisturize, add shine, and smooth the hair shaft.

Happi Scalp™ Scrub has a pH level of 3.7.

This scrub is free of sulfates, silicones, essential oils, fragrance, dyes, and drying alcohols.

For 30 years, celebrity hairstylist Chris McMillan has worked with every recognizable head of hair in Hollywood. But he could never find a product to do what he wanted: bring hair back to its strongest, healthiest state. So he collaborated with his childhood friend who also happens to be the founder of Drunk Elephant. Together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp—products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with coconut-based cleansers and shine-boosting amino acids. The rest just grew from there.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Product: Shea Butter Ultra Rich Body Cream
About:
What it is:
An ultra-rich body cream enriched with 25 percent shea butter to help intensely nourish skin and moisturize for up to 72 hours.

What it is formulated to do:
With an exceptionally high concentration of shea butter, this Ultra Rich Body Cream is the perfect moisturizer for dry to very dry skin. It helps to intensely nourish, protect, and restore skin’s hydrolipidic film. Enriched with moisturizing extracts of linseed, marshmallow, sweet almond, honey, and softening apricot oil, it helps to hydrate skin for up to 72 hours. The rich texture sinks quickly into the skin to leave it soft and comfortable without any greasy residue.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Since the 1980's, L'Occitane has set up a sustainable and fair trade partnership with the women of Burkina Faso who produce shea butter. To perpetuate this story with the women of this country, the L'Occitane foundation gets involved for women's entrepreneurship in Burkina Faso supporting literacy and microcredit programs and trainings for the development of income-generating activities.

About:
What it is: A concentrated serum that fights visible signs of aging and supercharges your skin for a pore-less, bouncy appearance.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Pitera™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's natural moisturizing factors; contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and acids to condition skin's natural functions.
- InfinitPower Technology: An exclusive cocktail of power ingredients formulated with calla lily extract, dokudami extract, and peony extract to charge the power source of skin to visibly plump up from within.

What Else You Need to Know: With a specially designed auto-dropper, just one powerful drop is the optimal dosage for each application. The concentrated formula with InfinitPower Technology visibly plumps skin from within, restoring visible bounciness and suppleness.

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

- 28 x 0.08 oz/ 2.26 g Eyeshadow in Suede (soft brown with gold shimmer), Indian Gold (fine sand shimmer), Industrial (intense taupe shimmer), Smoky Quartz (chocolate brown shimmer), Antique Olive (deep gold/green undertones), Sand Storm (matte burnt orange), Ochre (bronze shimmer/brown undertones), Skin (rose shimmer/pink undertones), Moonstone (champagne shimmer/peach undertone), Aluminum (vibrant metallic silver), True Gold (intense metallic gold), Pinija (moss green shimmer/brown undertones), Terracotta (rich copper), Sienna (metallic bronze/copper undertones), Shell (matte rose) Cream (creamy white/light iridescence), Golden Aquamarine (mint green with a silver pearlescent), Glam Green (taupe shimmer/green undertones), Bottle Green (deep green with gold), Arizona (matte terracotta), Golden Flesh (bronzed gold/copper undertones), Umber (burnt orange/brown undertones), Flamingo (matte peach-toned pink), Tropic (aqua with pearlescent gold), Cloudy Blue (ocean blue with a gold shimmer), Emerald Green (jade green), Cool Bronze (bronze/burnt orange undertone), Satin Tan (sand with subtle gold shimmer)

What else you need to know:
Internationally renowned makeup artist Natasha Denona developed her own eyeshadow formulas after struggling for over 20 years with eyeshadows that were dry, dull, and difficult to blend.

"When I launched these palettes everyone told me I was crazy because there are so many shades inside. I made them like this because I had to create a kit with all the basic colors that came in cool tones and warm tones from light to dark and in several textures. My 28 Palettes have become world renowned and the favorites of Desi Perkins, Nikki Tutorials, Wayne Goss, Kathleen Lights, and Jaclyn Hill. The formula is out of this world! It was a dream for me to create a pressed pigment that was easy for everyone to use. You can create endless looks with the 28 Palette. It’s a revolutionary product and a must have for everyone."—Natasha Denona

Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails.

Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.
ingredients:
-Jojoba Seed Oil: Strengthens hair.
-Wheat Germ Oil: Replenishes lost moisture and provides a natural UV filter, all while adding shine, strength, and softness.
-Dimethicone: Protects against thermal treatments, prevents moisture loss, and forms a barrier on the hair that smooths down the cuticle, providing excellent anti-frizz benefits.
-Sea Buckthorn Berry (Obliphica): Protects, hydrates, and nourishes hair.

About: What it is:  A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow. Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven TextureFormulation: OilHighlighted Ingredients:- Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil: This super-absorbable oil—rich in critical antioxidants such as tocopherol (vitamin E), tocotrienols, phenolic compounds, flavonoids, and omegas 6 and 9 fatty acids—moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly rejuvenates skin for a youthful-looking glow.Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.  What Else You Need to Know: Untouched by any chemical or fragrance, this highly absorbable oil quickly sinks in to visibly diminish fine lines and wrinkles. Appropriate for all skin, including the most sensitive, this oil contains high concentrations of polyphenols to deliver antioxidant defense against pollution and free radicals.This oil is free of essential oils and silicones. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free. Product: C.E.O Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil
About:
What it is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination 
Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
Formulation: Lightweight Oil
Highlighted Ingredients:
- THD Ascorbate (Vitamin C): Extremely stable, oil soluble form of vitamin C; helps fight the signs of aging caused by time, stress, lifestyle, and pollution, including dullness, visible loss of firmness, the signs of lines and wrinkles, and the appearance of dark spots and surface redness.  
- Golden Turmeric: Distilled fraction of turmeric oil, rich in antioxidants and calming compounds; applied topically, it may help to improve the look of surface redness and skin evenness.  
- Ginger Root Extract and Bisabolol: Promote evenness of skin tone and help to soothe the look of sensitivity.   
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.
What Else You Need to Know: Recharge your radiance with this glow-giving vitamin C-enriched oil. Advanced vitamin C—blended in a base of cold-pressed, red raspberry and evening primrose seed oils—gives your skin a fresh burst of luminosity. Golden turmeric extract is rich in antioxidants and calming compounds to improve the look of skin evenness.

About:
What it is: A retinol face oil that minimizes the look of lines, hyperpigmentation, blemishes, and sun damage, locking in moisture and restoring a healthy glow.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Acne and Blemishes, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Formulation: Oil

Highlighted Ingredients:
- 0.5% Retinol: Improves the look and feel of uneven skin tone and texture while warding off UV and free radical damage.
- 95% Virgin Marula Oil: High in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 and helps moisturize, nourish, and rejuvenate skin for a youthful glow.
- Ceramides: Help to fill in the spaces between skin cells (giving them elasticity), strengthen the skin barrier, and maintain the moisture balance of skin.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Designed for both new and experienced retinol users, A-Gloei™ was created with all skin in mind. Retinol gets a bad rap for being sensitizing, but A- Gloei™ is formulated with soothing marula oil and ceramides to gently deliver retinol to skin, ensuring high efficacy without redness or irritation.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, irritants, and PEGs.

What it is:
An ultra-lightweight, even faster absorbing version of Josie’s cult-favorite multitasking moisturizer that is perfect alone or under makeup to nourish and prime skin.

Solutions for:
- Oiliness
- Blemishes
- Dryness

If you want to know more…
Experience quick-absorbing hydration with this weightless version of Josie’s signature 100% Pure Argan Oil. Using a proprietary process, 100% Pure Argan Oil Light selects the lightest elements of Pure Argan Oil to deliver quicker-absorbing yet equally powerful benefits. This multitasking moisturizer nourishes and protects skin with vitamin E, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids for an optimally balanced, health-looking glow. Use as a daily moisturizer or as a hydrating makeup primer that visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin smoothness and hydration. Fear not if your skin is oily. This must-have oil is especially ideal for those with breakout-prone and sensitive skin.

What else you need to know:
Josie's Argan Oil Light is cold-pressed to ensure the most powerful, highest-grade oil. It is 100 percent pure, 100 percent natural, and free of any synthetics, fillers, or fragrance. Housed in a recyclable glass bottle and purchased from women's cooperatives in Morocco to support their social and economic welfare. These cooperatives work within a protected UNESCO biosphere reserve that ensures the protection and reforestation of Argan trees.

The amber glass is not just for looks! Unlike clear glass, amber glass filters out damaging blue and ultra-violet light that can break down the oil's beneficial compounds and nutrients, ultimately reducing it's effectiveness and potency.

This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without gluten, GMO, fragrance, and formaldehyde.

Research results:
In just 4 weeks, 100% Pure Argan Oil is clinically proven to:
- Visibly reduce coarse wrinkles and fine lines
- Significantly improve skin smoothness and hydration

- 86% agreed skin felt and looked more hydrated and supple
- 84% agreed skin felt and looked smoother
- 82% agreed skin felt and looked more radiant
- 84% agreed skin texture improved
- 81% agreed skin felt more balanced
- 80% agree skin felt calmer and soothed

About:
What it is: A lightweight, noncomedogenic herbal concentrate facial oil infused with cannabis sativa hemp-derived seed oil that calms skin and reduces redness.

Skin Type: Normal

Skincare Concerns: Blemishes, Redness, and Uneven Skin Tone

Formulation: Oil

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil: Helps improve skin’s barrier, reduce visible redness, and relieve discomfort while calming and soothing skin.
- Green Oregano Oil: Helps to relieve problem skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates. This product does not contain CBD.

What Else You Need to Know: Inspired by Kiehl’s heritage as an old-world apothecary, this herbaceous elixir is formulated with 100 percent naturally-derived** ingredients including cold-pressed cannabis sativa seed oil and green oregano oil. Uniquely formulated for problem skin such as oily- and blemish-prone skin, this efficacious herbal concentrate relieves visible redness and the appearance of discomfort. Over time, it also helps strengthen skin’s barrier to help skin protect itself. With a unique and herbaceous aroma, this noncomedogenic oil helps calm skin with the power of herbs.

**Kiehl’s considers ingredients to be naturally derived if they retain more than 50 percent of their molecular structure after being processed from a natural source.

Product: Ultimate Sun Protector Cream SPF 50+ Face Sunscreen
About:
What it is: A facial sunscreen with a protective veil that becomes stronger when exposed to heat and water. Ocean-friendly, and free of oxybenzone and octinoxate.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Formulation: Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:
- HeatForce Technology: A heat-sensing essence in the cream that becomes activated by external heat, forming a stronger barrier.
- WetForce Technology: Negative ions in the formula combine with positive ions in perspiration and water to create an additional layer of invisible sun protection.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, and hydroquinone.

What Else You Need to Know: HeatForce technology is activated on hot days once applied to your skin. For WetForce capabilities to engage, expose the area where lotion has been applied to water or perspiration for 30 minutes. This formula is water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, ocean friendly, and doesn’t leave skin feeling greasy. Reapply every two hours and immediately after towel drying.

Clinical Results: In a test of 102 women, immediately after applying the formula to their face:
- 95% said the formula felt lightweight and comfortable on their skin
- 95% said their faces felt moisturized

4 hours after applying:
- 97% said the formula remained resistant to water and perspiration
ingredients:

-WetForce Technology: Negative ions in the formula combine with positive ions in perspiration and water to create an additional layer of invisible sun protection.

If you want to know more…
Inspired by their beloved "Greenland First Ascent" Ultra Facial Cream, Kiehl’s created this daily, light-textured, 24-hour, moisturizer that leaves skin feeling balanced, comfortable, and hydrated. The formula also helps protect against skin-damaging UVA and UVB rays with broad spectrum SPF 30. Formulated with Antarcticine®, a Glycoprotein known to withstand extreme cold, and fountain plant, notable for its ability to help skin maintain its natural moisture reserves, this superb moisturizer leaves skin soft, smooth, and healthy-looking.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Through Ultra Facial Cream, Kiehl’s was honored to lend support and protection from the elements to the heroic team of the "Greenland First Ascent" expedition. The six explorers completed the first-ever ascent of Greenland’s ice covered peaks on May 30, 2005.

Kiehl’s is inspired by its rich heritage as an old-world apothecary, applying over 165 years’ worth of cosmetic, pharmaceutical, herbal, and medicinal knowledge into the formulations. They utilize the finest natural ingredients and incorporate advanced scientific technologies to ensure the highest quality and most efficacious formulas without compromise. They are protective of the environment as they maximize the use of renewable, sustainable, and biodegradable ingredients. Kiehl’s proudly stands behind the quality, efficacy, and safety of each of their products.

Product: SOS Save.Our.Skin Daily Rescue Facial Spray
About:
What it is: A simple but effective three-ingredient daily treatment spray to soothe stressed out skin and reduce the appearance of redness.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Redness

Formulation: Spray

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Hypochlorous Acid: Naturally produced by the body's immune system as a first line of defense to fight the appearance of redness and defend against bad bacteria, and when. When applied topically, it soothes, purifies, and cares for sensitive or stressed skin—leaving it looking clear, soft, and healthy.
- Water and Sodium Chloride: This isotonic (non-drying) solution is formulated to mimic the makeup of our own bodies—it is the optimal delivery solution for hypochlorous acid since it is found naturally in your white blood cells.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This pH-balanced (4.5) spray soothes skin and defends against damage from skin’s everyday stressors including makeup, sweat, grime, and pollution by maximizing the power of your skin's defense system and supporting its natural renewal process. It also has the National Eczema Association’s Seal of Acceptance™.

What it is:
A lightweight moisturizing toner that leaves skin supple, moisturized, and ready to absorb the next products in your regimen.

Solutions for:
- Dryness
- Loss of firmness and elasticity

If you want to know more…
This toner is now supercharged with 5-cera complex which leaves skin supple and moisturized. It also features panthenol, a calming complex of fig, centella asiatica, and phyto extracts which relieves cracked or flaky skin. This toner is for those who have dry, flaky, and rough-textured skin.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
Ceramides are our skin’s natural protection barrier. They are composed of intercellular lipids that act as skin’s defense against environmental aggressors and maintain moisture levels. Think of your skin as a brick wall: when it is first built, it is strong and sturdy. Over time, it needs fortification to remain strong. As we age, we lose ceramides, leading to a decrease in elasticity and moisture.

This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
ingredients:
-5-Cera Complex: Deeply moisturizes and strengthens skin.
-Panthenol: Relieves cracked or flaky skin.

An uplifting, refreshing, and hydrating citrus-scented spray that doubles as a mist and toner.

Solutions for:
- Acne and blemishes

If you want to know more…
The ultimate in uplifting skincare, this citrus-scented mist leaves skin feeling fresh, radiant, and balanced. May chang extract and sweet orange oil possess astringent properties that help remove impurities, regulates sebum production, and visibly tighten pores. Brightening fruit extracts—including guava, desert lime, and bilberry—along with green tea delivers a burst of antioxidants to boost hydration and revitalize tired, dull complexions, while calendula soothes irritations and calms unhappy skin.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.

About:

Formulation: Loose Powder

Coverage: Buildable

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.

What Else You Need to Know: Designed to pair with the Ultimate Blurring Setting Powder (sold separately), this puff has a luxurious, cushiony feel on the skin. Molding to the contours of the face, the puff‘s precision, flat edge allows for targeted setting and baking.
ingredients:
Suggested Usage:
-Press the puff into your desired amount of setting powder and tap off excess.
-Pat the powder onto your face, focusing on oily areas.
-To set your complexion, slide your fingers under the band so that the logo is right side up and your fingertips line up against the curved edge, and then buff the powder all over your face.
-If baking, apply a concentrated amount and let it sit for five to 10 minutes, and then brush excess product away.
-To bake under your eyes, along the sides of your nose, and beneath the hollows of your cheeks, slide your fingers under the band so that the logo is upside down and your fingertips line up against the flat edge, and then angle the flat edge to press the powder into your skin.

Care instructions:
-Hand wash using mild soap.
-Let sit to dry.

The Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile and Lavender helps soothe skin and senses with a calming botanical blend.

- 4 oz/ 118 mL Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea
- 4 oz/ 118 mL Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile and Lavender
